patterns: what is the chance of getting scholarship?
responses: College offers a number of scholarships to the deserving students at the time of admission. Admitted student with highest score in entrance exam is awarded with semester scholarship.    Students securing highest marks in semester exams is awarded with semester scholarship.

patterns: what is the phone number of college?
what is the contact number of college
what is the procedure for admission
what are the documents for admission
responses: Students who have passed the entrance exam conducted by the Institute of Science and Technology (IoST), T.U., can only apply for admission at Sagarmatha College of Science and Technology. Students are selected strictly on a merit basis from amongst the applicants.To be eligible to appear in the IoST entrance exam, one must have secured a minimum of 45 % marks in +2 Science or A Level or Diploma in Engineering or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics. One who has appeared in the final examination of +2 Science or equivalent can also apply.
